programme.title: Jirga
programme.desc: In this bracingly raw film about vindication and grace, an Australian ex-soldier goes to Afghanistan to seek absolution from the family of a civilian he had killed in the war. And it will be the 10 year old son of the deceased who will decide his fate.

programme.title: Arcadia
programme.desc: In this searing family drama, a family is traveling across California towards a better life. However, their mother is not with them. Through the eyes of young Greta, the heart-breaking dysfunctionality of the humble suburban family emerges.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Decisions In Athens
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet goes on an unofficial assignment abroad to help his ex-wife Sevim to track down her missing partner Steffen, an investigative journalist, and his kidnapped daughter Clara in the Greek capital Athens.

programme.title: The Cuban
programme.desc: An unexpected friendship begins between an elderly Cuban musician with dementia who is brought out of his shell by his care worker, and a disillusioned young pre-med Afghan student named Mina. Through a shared love of music, both their lives are changed.

programme.title: Who Framed Santa Claus?
programme.desc: Wonderfast, a highly successful online delivery company, enjoys great business all year around except during Christmas. Despite attempts to sabotage Santa Claus, their efforts produce unexpected results. Will the Christmas spirit prevail after all?

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: Until Tomorrow
programme.desc: A single mother's courage is tested when she resorts to desperate measures to hide her illegitimate child from her parents.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: In small town Maine, a school bus driver becomes distracted during her end-of-day inspection and fails to notice a sleeping boy in the back of the bus. What happens next shatters the tranquillity of her small logging town.

programme.title: Storm Warning
programme.desc: During a ferocious storm, two teenagers lose sight of the 10-year-old boy they’re babysitting and he disappears – never to be found. 20 years later, the news of the murder of their high-school teacher forces them to confront their traumas and old wounds.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Girl Gone Missing
programme.desc: Public Prosecutor Mehringer has been dealt a tough hand in his case against the Ukrainian arms trafficker Artem Lazarev: his most important witness is supposed to die. Investigator Sarah Kohr helps to stage the witness’ death, but all is not as they seem.

programme.title: Built To Scale
programme.desc: Lou, company misfit, builds a miniature model of her office and discovers she has the magical ability to control the real world. As she attempts to use it, she discovers that she is inadvertently reproducing the very toxicity she is trying to escape.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Jirga
programme.desc: In this bracingly raw film about vindication and grace, an Australian ex-soldier goes to Afghanistan to seek absolution from the family of a civilian he had killed in the war. And it will be the 10 year old son of the deceased who will decide his fate.

programme.title: Macondo
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: Natatorium
programme.desc: Lilja stays with her estranged grandparents while she auditions for a performance group. When her dad and aunt find out, a sense of panic arises. Dark secrets emerge from the household that threaten to destroy her future career and her life.

programme.title: Parents vs Influencers
programme.desc: Philosophy professor Paolo is a single father who finds himself losing his teenage daughter to her social media addiction. His efforts to dissuade her from using social media ironically results in Paolo becoming a social media influencer himself.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: In small town Maine, a school bus driver becomes distracted during her end-of-day inspection and fails to notice a sleeping boy in the back of the bus. What happens next shatters the tranquillity of her small logging town.

programme.title: Built To Scale
programme.desc: Lou, company misfit, builds a miniature model of her office and discovers she has the magical ability to control the real world. As she attempts to use it, she discovers that she is inadvertently reproducing the very toxicity she is trying to escape.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Girl Gone Missing
programme.desc: Public Prosecutor Mehringer has been dealt a tough hand in his case against the Ukrainian arms trafficker Artem Lazarev: his most important witness is supposed to die. Investigator Sarah Kohr helps to stage the witness’ death, but all is not as they seem.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Lemonade
programme.desc: Mara, a young Romanian mother, is a caretaker in the US on a temporary visa. Life seemed perfect after she got married and brought her son over. However, she faces abuses of power from the officer in her green card process, who seeks to exploit her plight.

programme.title: Macondo
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: Elaha
programme.desc: Elaha, a young Kurdish-German woman, battles patriarchy and family expectations while seeking her own path. Elaha struggles with traditions, marriage and virginity, and she must choose between emancipation or delusion.

programme.title: Natatorium
programme.desc: Lilja stays with her estranged grandparents while she auditions for a performance group. When her dad and aunt find out, a sense of panic arises. Dark secrets emerge from the household that threaten to destroy her future career and her life.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Devil ’s Moor
programme.desc: While driving with her mother, detective Sarah Kohr witnesses a robbery at a gas station and intervenes. After subduing the perpetrator who turns out to be just a 15-year-old, she has to investigate how he was able to get his hand on a live weapon.

programme.title: Parents vs Influencers
programme.desc: Philosophy professor Paolo is a single father who finds himself losing his teenage daughter to her social media addiction. His efforts to dissuade her from using social media ironically results in Paolo becoming a social media influencer himself.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Confetti
programme.desc: Due to her dyslexia, Meimei is ostracized by her school and community. Encouraged by Meimei's teacher from school, Lan leaves everything behind in China for New York City in hopes of finding an education program for her daughter.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Director Jaze lost his mother to cancer in 2015. The Gift, inspired by his relationship with her, is an open letter from him to his mother.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.desc: What does perfection in a romantic relationship look like? Compatibility? Chemistry? Jon and Cheryl have both but there’s something still lacking. A deeply relevant and stirring snapshot of the peaks and troughs of young love.

programme.title: Complicity
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life incident. Cheng Liang, a Chinese illegal immigrant in Japan finds new direction when he fakes his identity and lands an apprenticeship with a master soba chef. However, the threat of deportation always lurks around the corner.

programme.title: Domingo (2021)
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.
